events.title: John, Gerry and Shirl travel from Wellington to the South Island

movie.title: Goodbye Pork Pie
movie.plot: Gerry hires a car in Kaitaia with a stolen licence and travels to Invercargill with John, who's wife has just left him. The ultimate NZ roadtrip adventure.

events.title: Harlan Thrombey's toxicology report is written

movie.title: Knives Out
movie.plot: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 45 wins & 93 nominations.
